dn9:7.7.3.1: sīlasampanno, indriyesu guttadvāro → bhojane mattaññū (bj, mr)
dn9:7.7.5.3: Pisuṇaṁ vācaṁ → pisuṇāvācaṁ (pts1ed) | samaggarato → samaggarāmo (bj) | anuppadātā → anuppādātā (pts1ed)
dn9:7.7.12.2: nāḷikaṁ asiṁ → khaggaṁ (bj, pts1ed); asiṁ khaggaṁ (sya-all, km); khaggaṁ asiṁ (mr)
dn9:7.7.13.2: janapadakathaṁ itthikathaṁ → itthikathaṁ purisakathaṁ (bj, cck, sya1ed, pts1ed); itthīkathaṁ purisakathaṁ (sya2ed); itthikathaṁ purisakathaṁ kumārakathaṁ kumārikathaṁ (mr)
dn9:8.1.3.3: byantiṁ kareyya → byantīkareyya (bj, sya-all, km); vyantikareyya (pts1ed)
dn9:8.1.4.5: na ca me → nacassa me (bj, mr)
dn9:50.2: sova → svera (bj, pts1ed); soyeva (sya-all); so ca (mr)
